entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
